Several Famous Rankings of 2016
NJU ranks 120th in 2016 QS World University Rankings, and ranks 26th in 2016 Asian University Rankings, and ranks 8th in 2016 BRICS Rankings.





2016 ESI Rankings
NJU is one of the leading comprehensive universities in China. According to the Essential Science Indicators, 16 academic disciplines at NJU are ranked in the to





2016 Nature Index
In 2016, NJU was ranked 20th in the Global Nature Index among global universities, 4th in the Asia-Pacific Nature Index , and 2nd among Chinese Universities .





2015 Nature Index

2014 Nature Index
